email_body: Dear User, Your Netflix subscription could not be renewed due to a billing issue. Please update your payment details to avoid service interruption: http://netflix-billing-update.example/login
Your monthly bank statement for September is now available. Please log in to your secure account to view it.
email_subject: Your Monthly Bank Statement Is Ready

email_body: Congratulations! You have been selected to receive a free gift card. Confirm your details now at www.freegift-rewards.ga to claim your reward.
email_subject: You've Been Selected! Claim Your Gift

email_body: Your package has been delivered successfully. Thank you for shopping with us. View delivery details here.
Security Alert: We detected suspicious activity on your Apple ID. Verify your account immediately to prevent suspension: http://appleid-secure-check.example
Your class timetable for the upcoming semester has been published. Please log in to the student portal to review your schedule.
You are eligible for a tax refund. Submit your information now to receive your payment faster: www.tax-refund-now.tk
This is a reminder that your electricity bill is due on October 5. View your bill or make a payment online.
Your WhatsApp account has been flagged for unusual activity. Confirm your phone number to restore access: http://whatsapp-verification.example
Thank you for registering for the cybersecurity workshop. Event details and materials can be accessed using the link below.
